```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data = read_csv('./Data/masterDF[2018-2020].csv')

freq = as.data.frame(table(data$Player))
colnames(freq) = c("Player", "Freq")

data = merge(data, freq, by = "Player")

avg = data %>%
  group_by(Player) %>%
  filter(Freq > 16) %>%
  do(tail(.,17)) %>%
  summarise_if(is.numeric, mean, na.rm = TRUE)

avg = select(avg, -c(...2,Freq))
avg
```
